dmca.title: Re: [ABUSE] DMCA COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT NOTICE - mikeinc.net
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, March 23, 2006 7:31 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: Re: [ABUSE] DMCA COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT NOTICE - mikeinc.net

This message was received at abuse@theplanet.com on Thursday, March 23, 2006
at
03:45:15 and concerns a matter for which responsibility is delegated to your
team. The message and headers follow.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

SUBJECT:
[ABUSE] DMCA COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT NOTICE - mikeinc.net

MESSAGE BODY:

This is the 5th incident of copyright infringement from mikeinc.net,
regarding the unauthorized reproduction and redistribution of images
belonging to Camwhores.com.

http://mikeinc.net/forum/attachments/Aceentrance_1[12].jpg
http://mikeinc.net/forum/attachments/Aceentrance_2[13].jpg
http://mikeinc.net/forum/attachments/Aceentrance_3[14].jpg

The forums on Mikeinc.net are also being used to facilitate the trading and
unauthorized distribution of our property, encouraged by the owner of this
site.

A US Mail certified letter is being mailed to your current hosting company
with a list of all previous DMCA complaints, printed copies of all forum
threads where our images have been posted or links to our property has been
posted, as well as all posts from the site owner in the forum encouraging
and requesting copyright infringement.

Additionally, requests from other copyright holders to have Mikeinc.net
remove images belonging to them have been met with refusal.  (Mikeinc.net's
response to one: "NO! ... show me the copyright orginals and video then I
will Enjoy the pictures guys") As I'm sure you're aware, nothing in
copyright law requires the copyright holder to present original copies(which
I'm not even sure what that means in the case of digital photographs) to
request their removal after being distributed illegally.


Mikeinc.net: This is the last friendly request we will make to keep our
property and the trading of our property off your site. If we see any more
materials belonging to Camwhores.com on Mikeinc.net, we will not hesitate to
pursue further legal action, including suing for damages (up to $150,000 per
work infringed) as well as requesting the shutdown of your site allowed
under the DMCA.


>
>
> Four days have passed with no response from the owners of mikeinc.net  
> regarding our previous notice to them.
>
>
> We are amending this complaint to include additional images   
> discovered on the mikeinc.net website that the copyrights are owned  
> by CamWhores.com:
>
> http://www,mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_images/photoalbum/59.jpg
> http://www.mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_public/attachments/Kitty03%
> 5B222%5D%5B606%5D.jpg
> http://www.mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_public/attachments/
> Kitty022% 5B381%5D%5B607%5D.jpg
> http://www.mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_public/attachments/Kitty01%
> 5B220%5D.jpg
> http://www.mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_public/attachments/Kitty02%
> 5B221%5D.jpg
> http://www.mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_public/attachments/Kitty03%
> 5B222%5D.jpg
> http://www.mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_public/attachments/Kitty04%
> 5B223%5D.jpg
> http://www.mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_public/attachments/
> Kitty021% 5B380%5D.jpg
> http://www.mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_public/attachments/
> Kitty022% 5B381%5D.jpg
>
> We demand that all images be removed immediately.
>
> If all images are not removed by 5pm Eastern Time on August 8th,   
> 2005, further actions will be taken by us. This is our final attempt  
> to resolve this via email. Failure to remove these images subjects  
> you to up to $150,000 in damages (plus our attorney's costs). We have  
> successfully pursued infringement cases before.
>
>
>
>
> On Aug 3, 2005, at 6:37 PM, Kevin - Stile Project wrote:
>
> >
> >
> >Once again, mikeinc.net is infringing on our copyrights.
> >
> >
> >
> >Images belonging to CamWhores.com that mikeinc.net is using without
> >permission:
> >
> >http://www.mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_public/attachments/bettie2
> >[632].jpg
> >http://www.mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_public/attachments/bettie1
> >[631].jpg
> >
> >Images of ours that mikeinc.net has illegally removed our watermark:
> >
> >http://www.mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_public/attachments/bettie
> >[633].jpg
> >
> >
> >Images that have had the copyrights assigned to CamWhores com and are 
> >being used without permission:
> >
> >http://www.mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_public/attachments/
> >fetishdoll07[580].jpg
> >http://www.mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_public/attachments/
> >fetishdoll08[581].jpg
> >http://www.mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_public/attachments/
> >fetishdoll09[582].jpg
> >http://www.mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_public/attachments/
> >fetishdoll14[583].jpg
> >http://www.mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_public/attachments/
> >fetishdoll21[584].jpg
> >http://www.mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_public/attachments/
> >fetishdoll22[585].jpg
> >http://www.mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_public/attachments/
> >fetishdoll23[586].jpg
> >http://www.mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_public/attachments/
> >fetishdoll26[587].jpg
> >http://www.mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_public/attachments/
> >fetishdoll27[588].jpg
> >
> >
> >
> >We would like to again remind the administrators of mikeinc.net that 
> >they do not have permission to display any image obtained from 
> >CamWhores.com, even if they illegally remove our watermarks from the 
> >images.
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >On Apr 30, 2005, at 4:18 PM, Kevin - Stile Project wrote:
> >
> >
> >>
> >>
> >>
> >>Via E-Mail;
> >>
> >>May 30, 2005
> >>
> >>To: mikeinc.net
> >>
> >>IT HAS COME TO OUR ATTENTION THAT YOU ARE IN VIOLATION OF OUR 
> >>COPYRIGHTS RE:
> >>DMCA (Digital Millenium Copyright Act). Your site has stolen text 
> >>and/or images from our site, and is using them illegally. Examples 
> >>of infringing images include, but are not limited to:
> >>
> >>
> >>http://mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_images/photoalbum/5.jpg
> >>http://mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_images/photoalbum/99.jpg
> >>http://mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_images/photoalbum/56.jpg
> >>http://mikeinc.net/cam-girls/fusion_images/photoalbum/57.jpg
> >>
> >>
> >>In many cases, our "camwhores.com" logo/watermark have been removed 
> >>from the images through cropping or "blacking out".
> >>
> >>The full exclusive distribution rights to these images has been 
> >>assigned to camwhores.com, and are used without permission.
> >>
> >>Additionally, your host is now on notice that it is in direct 
> >>violation of the DMCA.
> >>
> >>Unless the infringing images are removed within 24 hours, we will be 
> >>forced to seek damages via litigation.
> >>
> >>Intentional unauthorized use of an image or text subjects you to 
> >>potential liability for statutory damages of up to $150,000 per work 
> >>infringed (under
> >>17 U.S.C. Section 504(c)), plus any costs and attorneys' fees 
> >>incurred by us in pursuing legal recourse against you (17 U.S.C. 
> >>section 505).
> >>The
> >>Copyright Act also allows for the seizure of your equipment (17 
> >>U.S.C.
> >>Section 503).
> >>
> >>Additionally, a copy of this letter is being sent to your service 
> >>provider.
> >>Thus, your service provider is now on notice that its facilities are 
> >>being used to infringe copyrights of us, and risks being held 
> >>contributorily liable for any further infringements. If your service 
> >>provider chooses to avail itself of the protections provided under 
> >>the new Online Copyright Infringement Liability Limitation Act (17 
> >>U.S.C. 512), this letter serves as a request for the URL listing the 
> >>service provider's Designated Agent for complaint handling required 
> >>by 17 U.S.C. 512(c)(2) and as a request for the required termination 
> >>policy required in 17 U.S.C. Section 512(c)(i) (A)(iii).
> >>
> >>
> >>I ask that you immediately cease and desist from these and any other 
> >>activities that infringe our rights.  I request that you remove all 
> >>uses of the photographs from your site/HTML.  I also request that 
> >>you contact me within 24 hours so we can discuss a fair settlement.  
> >>We are extremely concerned about any unauthorized uses of our 
> >>property and will not hesitate to enforce our rights by all 
> >>available and lawful means.
> >>
> >>We reserve each and every one of our rights and remedies in this 
> >>matter, none of which has been waived, whether now existing or 
> >>whether hereafter asserted, including the right to commence 
> >>litigation against you, or any service providers hosting your 
> >>material, and any other person or persons acting in concert with 
> >>you, without further notice to any of you.
> >>Your
> >>prompt response will greatly determine what our next step will be.
> >>
> >>Unless you cease and desist within 24 hours we WILL take legal 
> >>action in the form of a lawsuit against you and your associates.
> >>
> >>Please e-mail us back letting us know what actions you have taken.
> >>
> >>CAMWHORES.COM
> >>STILE PROJECT INC.
> >>
> >>
> >>
> >>
> >
> >
>
